name: The Power Of Creation[WEB Version]
description:
=====[WEBPAGE DESIGN: WIP]=====

===============================
---------[What Is TPOC?]-------------
>TPOC, Stands For The Power Of Creation Is A Game
Develop In Construct 2... Is A Game Where You Survive
And Must Gain And Win In The Life... We Introduce To You
Everyone Is Our [Non-Intellegently] War Of Nature...
And More
>TPOC is Develop By 3 Members Of The Team...  ItsMeDevRoland,
William Lee[Lead Artist] And AyesshaGanda[Beta]
>TPOC's Idea = TPOC, is Nothing Like
Your Ordinary Minecraft/Terraria Clone...
But Theres A Catch... Its Not Your Ordinary Clone...
It Has Alot Of Story... And Also Well.. About the Monster
At Night[LOL]... 
=================================
>TPOC's Future, I Say... TPOC is A Straight Forward Hardest
Game Ever... This Game Will Follow What Dont Starve Together
Genre[HORROR], And For Sure... Ive Build This With All Of My Time...
I Spent Half Of My Time Here... So Sooner... The Game Will
Evolve At Some Point... >What Will Be Next?: Expect The
Home Update... Currently There's Only Unbreakable Walls
And Uhhh... Thats All.. But Soon... This Will Change...
More Furniture... Weapon... Terrifying Creature...
More Demons... And Mod Support...
> When Will This "Mod Support" Come?: Mod Support Isnt
Actually The Easiest To Implement... Just Learning Some Tutorial...
Soon... More Things To Come
================================
Tags: #Sandbox #Horror #World #Buildtosurvive #DayVsNight
#Survival #Strategy
================================
PS: I DONT WANNA SCREENSHOT THE WHOLE THING
BECAUSE IM LAZY AND LASTLY I DONT WANNA
SPOIL ANYTHING
================================
